name: Hire me fulltime
description: I'm passionate about building quintessential products that starts conversations. There's a lot to build yet

name: Hire me as Freelancer
description: Got a cool side project? I'd love to lend a hand! Let's collaborate on weekends and turn your ideas into reality.

name: Order a Product Roast
description: Need a fresh perspective? I'll take a look at your product and share my honest, constructive feedback to help you improve.
